org.activebpel.rt.bpel.def
Class AeBaseDefNamespaceContext

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.def.AeBaseDefNamespaceContext
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAeMutableNamespaceContext, IAeNamespaceContext
public class AeBaseDefNamespaceContext
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAeMutableNamespaceContext

A concrete implementation of a namespace context that uses a bpel def object as the namespace info source.

resolvePrefixToNamespace

public java.lang.String resolvePrefixToNamespace(java.lang.String aPrefix)
Description copied from interface: IAeNamespaceContext
Resolves a namespace prefix into a namespace URI. This method should return null if the namespace could not be found.

Specified by:

Parameters:

See Also:

getOrCreatePrefixForNamespace

public java.lang.String getOrCreatePrefixForNamespace(java.lang.String aPreferredPrefix,
                                                      java.lang.String aNamespace)
Description copied from interface: IAeMutableNamespaceContext
Gets the prefix mapped to the given namespace or creates a new one. If the preferred prefix is supplied then this will serve as the new prefix mapping or the base of the mapping if already mapped to another namespace. Note: By default, this method will return a prefix even if the namespace matches the default declared namespace. This is useful for encoding QNames as attribute or element values.

Specified by:
getOrCreatePrefixForNamespace in interface IAeMutableNamespaceContext
Parameters:
aPreferredPrefix - - optional preferred prefix
aNamespace -
See Also:
IAeMutableNamespaceContext.getOrCreatePrefixForNamespace(java.lang.String, java.lang.String)

getOrCreatePrefixForNamespace

public java.lang.String getOrCreatePrefixForNamespace(java.lang.String aPreferredPrefix,
                                                      java.lang.String aNamespace,
                                                      boolean aAllowDefaultNamespace)
Description copied from interface: IAeMutableNamespaceContext
Gets the prefix mapped to the given namespace or creates a new one. If the preferred prefix is supplied then this will serve as the new prefix mapping or the base of the mapping if already mapped to another namespace.

Specified by:
getOrCreatePrefixForNamespace in interface IAeMutableNamespaceContext
Parameters:
aPreferredPrefix - - optional preferred prefix
aNamespace -
aAllowDefaultNamespace - - if true, then we'll return "" if the namespace matches the declared default namespace. If false, then a prefix will be created even if it matches the default namespace. This is useful for encoding QNames.
See Also:
IAeMutableNamespaceContext.getOrCreatePrefixForNamespace(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, boolean)
